Title: Establishes a right of first refusal in municipalities for state land to be sold at public auction
Summary: Establishes a right of first refusal in municipalities for state land to be sold at public auction.
LawCode: Amd ยง33, Pub Lds L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public lands law, in relation to establishing a right of first refusal in municipalities for state land to be sold at public auction
